inclusion.criterion: All histologic types of endometrial cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Intercurrent treatment between biopsy taking and start of hormonal treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contra-indications to perform a PET-CT scan or a CT scan with intravenous contrast
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of hormonal therapy in the three months preceding performance of FES PET
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
